issue.title: [Python] Add utility functions (or a richer type hierachy) for checking whether data type instances are members of various type classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1576](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1576). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
E.g. `is_integer`, `is_unsigned_integer`. This could be implemented similar to NumPy, too (`isinstance(t, pa.FloatingPoint)` or something)
